targets.query: SELECT count(*) FROM jsr223postprocessor WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "samples" WHERE ("type" = 'REQUEST') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "responsecode" fill(none)
SELECT count(*) FROM jsr223postprocessor WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Response time of all steps in $Scenario (ms)
Steps with highest response time in $Scenario (ms)
Response time of all requests in $Scenario | $Step (ms)
Requests with highest response time in $Step (ms)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jsr223postprocessor" WITH KEY = "loadtestname"
list.name: TestName
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jsr223postprocessor" WITH KEY = "loadtestname"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jsr223listener" WITH KEY = "loadscriptname"
list.name: Scenario
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jsr223listener" WITH KEY = "loadscriptname"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jsr223listener" WITH KEY = "transactionname" WHERE "loadscriptname" =~ /^$Scenario$/ AND type='REQUEST'
list.name: Step
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jsr223listener" WITH KEY = "transactionname" WHERE "loadscriptname" =~ /^$Scenario$/ AND type='REQUEST'

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jsr223listener" WITH KEY = "label" WHERE "loadscriptname" =~ /^$Scenario$/ AND "transactionname" =~ /^$Step$/
list.name: Request
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jsr223listener" WITH KEY = "label" WHERE "loadscriptname" =~ /^$Scenario$/ AND "transactionname" =~ /^$Step$/
